lead_paragraph: Paula finds herself pregnant and without a man when she is abandoned by her boyfriend. When Paula's mother visits from Spain to meet the father of the baby, Paula passes off film composer Ezequiel as her "boyfriend" to her mother.
snippet: Paula finds herself pregnant and without a man when she is abandoned by her boyfriend. When Paula's mother visits from Spain to meet the father of the baby, Paula passes off film composer Ezequiel as her "boyfriend" to her mother.
